issue.title: [Website][Docs] Migrate to Matomo from Google Analytics
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16576](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16576). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Google Analytics tags still exist in old documentations.

It's for becoming compliant with the GDPR (the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation).

See also:
- https://privacy.apache.org/policies/privacy-policy-public.html
- https://privacy.apache.org/faq/committers.html
